    • setHdr

      public void setHdr(short numFlds, AttrType[] types, short[] strSizes) throws IOException, InvalidTypeException, InvalidTupleSizeException
      setHdr will set the header of this tuple.
      Parameters:
      numFlds - number of fields
      types - [] contains the types that will be in this tuple
      strSizes - [] contains the sizes of the string
      Throws:
      IOException - I/O errors
      InvalidTypeException - Invalid tupe type
      InvalidTupleSizeException - Tuple size too big
